participant_1.name: Lila Hayes
participant_1.personality: Calm and introspective, Lila values deep connections with nature and spirituality.
participant_1.background: i quit my job to pursue my spirituality full time. i have not spoken in three months. i live in alaska. i like meditation. i'm a buddhist.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and pragmatic, Jake enjoys hands-on activities and exploring the outdoors.
participant_2.background: i've a black lab named trooper. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i live in colorado. i'm a mechanical engineer.
